The Quranic researcher said to him: as they are on it (P-90) is a difference of "killing"; That is, they were cursed when they were fired with the fire, and they are around it in a place close to it from the honorable ones from the edges of the Akhdoud, as in the saying of the east: They overwhelm it and become on the fire and the roll, and it was said: The words are added to added.That is, on its edges or its parts, and the gathering is that what is meant is that it is not possible.
